languages.text: "Что вы такое говорите, Вольный Торговец?! Как же я?.. Я никогда не занималась подобным!" {n}Обычно бледное лицо Кассии краснеет до кончиков ушей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Что вы такое говорите, Вольный Торговец!? Как же я?.. Я никогда не занималась подобным!" {n}Обычно бледное лицо Кассии краснеет до кончиков ушей.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

languages.text: “你在说什么呢，行商浪人？我该怎么——？我以前从来没做过类似的事情！”{n}卡西娅一向苍白的脸立刻涨得通红，连耳朵都变红了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你在说什么呢，行商浪人？我该怎么——？我以前从来没做过类似的事情！”{n}卡西娅一向苍白的脸立刻涨得通红，连耳朵都变红了。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué quiere decir, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Cómo voy a...? ¡Nunca he hecho nada por el estilo!». {n}El rostro de Cassia, normalmente pálido, se ruboriza tanto que hasta las orejas se vuelven rojas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué quiere decir, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Cómo voy a...? ¡Nunca he hecho nada por el estilo!». {n}El rostro de Cassia, normalmente pálido, se ruboriza tanto que hasta las orejas se vuelven rojas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「何を言ってるのです、自由開拓者様？どうしてあたくしが…？あたくしはそんなことをしたことはありません！」{n}普段は青白いカシアの顔が、耳まで赤くなるほど紅潮する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何を言ってるのです、自由開拓者様？どうしてあたくしが…？あたくしはそんなことをしたことはありません！」{n}普段は青白いカシアの顔が、耳まで赤くなるほど紅潮する。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Was sagt Ihr da, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Wie könnte ich ...? Ich habe dergleichen noch nie getan!" {n}Cassias ansonsten blasses Gesicht errötet so stark, dass sogar ihre Ohren betroffen sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was sagt Ihr da, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Wie könnte ich ...? Ich habe dergleichen noch nie getan!" {n}Cassias ansonsten blasses Gesicht errötet so stark, dass sogar ihre Ohren betroffen sind.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pardon, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Comment pourrais-je... ? Je n'ai jamais rien fait de tel ! » {n}Cassia, habituellement si pâle, rougit jusqu'aux oreilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pardon, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Comment pourrais-je... ? Je n'ai jamais rien fait de tel ! » {n}Cassia, habituellement si pâle, rougit jusqu'aux oreilles.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sen neler söylüyorsun Hür Tacir? Ben nasıl...? Ben hiç böyle bir şey yapmadım!" {n}Cassia'nın normalde solgun duran yüzü öylesine kızarıyor ki bu kızarıklık, kulaklarına kadar ulaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, Rogue Trader? How could I—? I have never done anything like that!" {n}Cassia's usually pale face flushes so deeply that even her ears turn red.{/n}
